metadata.name: TeamViewer Log File Deleted
metadata.comment: Detects the deletion of the TeamViewer log files which may indicate an attempt to destroy forensic evidence

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 4 AND contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\\\teamviewer_')) AND endswith(lower(file.path), lower('.log')) AND NOT lower(actor.process.name) = lower('c:\\\\windows\\\\system32\\\\svchost.exe'))

output.summary: Detects the deletion of the TeamViewer log files which may indicate an attempt to destroy forensic evidence
